About Me Publications Research Teaching

Research Page

Research Interests

  • Evolutionary Computation
  • Swarm Intelligence
  • Memetic Computing
  • Neural Networks
  • Combinatorial Optimization
  • Dynamic Optimization Problems

Professional Mememberships

  • Member, IEEE Task Force on Evolutionary Computation in Dynamic and Uncertain Environments (ECiDUE), since 2013
  • Member, IEEE Computational Intelligence Society (CIS), since 2013
  • Member, IEEE, since 2013

Honors and Awards

  • Nominatee for the Best Paper award of EvoApplications 2016 at Evostar 2016 Conference, for the paper "Direct memory schemes for population-based incremental learning in cyclically changing environments"
  • Nominatee for the Best Paper award of the Ant Colony Optimization - Swarm Intelligence (ACO - SI) track at 2015 Genetic and Evolutionary Computation Conference, for the paper "An ant colony optimization based memetic algorithm for the dynamic travelling salesman problem"
  • Winner of the Microsoft Best Project Price, Department of Computer Science, University of Leicester, UK

Invited Talks

  • Seminar talk, School of Computer Science, University of Birmingham, Birmingham UK, March 2016
  • Seminar talk, School of Computing, University of Kent, Kent, UK, December 2013
  • Seminar talk, Faculty of Technology, De Montfort University, Leicester, UK, May 2012
  • Seminar talk, School of Engineering & Computing, Bournemouth University, Bournemouth, UK, December 2012
  • Seminar talk, School of Computer Science, Brunel University, London, March 2012
